overview:
Sebastian Scheerer is a Co-Founder and the Head User Interface Designer at 6Wunderkinder. He is responsible for all user interfaces and is the architect of the interface for Wunderlist. He is currently working on the look and feel of the upcoming productivity platform Wunderkit. Before he starts pushing pixels in Photoshop he writes concepts and creates wireframes.

Prior to Co-Founding 6Wunderkinder, he worked as the Co-Chief of Web Design at Innovatics GmbH. His formal design education took place at AMD Akademie Friedrichshafen.
